dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 8.8 million passages and over 500k pairs of query and judged-relevant passages for training purposes, used for machine reading comprehension tasks.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO passage dataset

dcterms:description: Sets of obstinate queries from the MS MARCO dataset that are particularly difficult for state-of-the-art rankers to satisfy.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO Chameleons sets of obstinate queries
